content:
Those cunning fish,
They'll always test you a bit first,
Just be patient... patient and wait!

When you feel a fish bite,
<color=#38b6c5>click the left mouse button right away</color>!
And you'll catch them~!

So, let's quietly sneak up
to the rippling water's surface,
and cast our fishing rod—super fast!

When it comes to fishing,
I prefer the fish that stay quietly underwater.
After all, fish that can't fly are much cuter~

I know how to fish!
See those ripples in the water over there?
That means there's a school of fish playing underneath.

Fishing in the wild is way more exciting!
The further away, the bigger they are, the harder to catch,
The more I want to take on the challenge!

If the ripples on the water are too far away,
you can <color=#38b6c5>hold down the left mouse button to charge up</color>,
and cast your line super~~far!

Don't rush to pull up your rod,
They'll nibble at the bait a few times to test it,
You need to be patient at times like this! Though I never am.

So basically, when the fish bites the hook,
<color=#38b6c5>click the left mouse button immediately</color>!
Sani strikes with perfect accuracy! Want to give it a try?

When I was out adventuring this one time, I encountered a kind of flying fish that would leap out of the water and into the air, slapping me right across the face with its tail. It definitely made fishing more convenient, but it sure hurt my face.

Aim at the ripples,
<color=#38b6c5>click the left mouse button,
</color>
Whoosh~ Cast away!
